knimeNode.name: BERT Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node makes predictions for the input data based on the trained BERT model by BERT Classification Learner.

fullDescription.intro: The node makes predictions for the input data based on the trained BERT model by BERT Classification Learner.

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: A column with a plain text (String), that contains text to be classified. No special pre-processing is needed.
The size of a chunk of the input data used for model update.
If active a column with provided name will be created in the output table. Otherwise the default name will be used for the column with predictions.
If active the columns with class probabilities will be created in the output table.
If not empty the suffix will be added to every column name for class probabilities columns.
